feed.title: GitHub Scala Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Scala in GitHub

entry.title: phancox/scala-orm-poc
entry.summary:
Proof of concept for various approaches to data persistence in relational databases for Scala applications.

Proof of concept for various approaches to data persistence in relational databases for Scala applications. Investigates Slick (1.0), MapperDAO, and Hibernate.

Partly ported to Slick 3.0 but required changes appear to be incompatible with maintaining three ORM approaches concurrently. Future application development will be performed using Slick (3.0) so this repository is left here for reference only.
